data.title: Prudential Private Capital
data.meta_description: Get to know Jason Richardson, Executive Managing Director of Global Corporate Finance at Prudential Private Capital.
data.text:
"Whatâs neat about us is that we have locations around the globe, but each office feels very local, very specific to its surrounding culture. Thatâs intentional. It has really enabled us to get a good grasp on a variety of markets, and puts our partners at ease."

About Jason

Jason Richardson, CFA, is the Executive Managing Director of our Dallas, Los Angeles, Mexico City, San Francisco, and Sydney Global Corporate Finance offices, overseeing the private placement and mezzanine activity in those regions.

This website should not be construed as investment advice or an offer or solicitation any investment advisory service.Â Â This website is meant to be for information purposes solely for portfolio companies and prospective portfolio companies.

Prudential is authorized to transact business in all U.S. states and the District of Columbia. Product availability varies by state and country. Prudential, the Prudential logo, and the Rock symbol are service marks of Prudential Financial, Inc. and its related entities, registered in many jurisdictions worldwide.
